                     int xPos,
                     int yPos,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     double minVal,
                     double maxVal,
                     double currentVal,
                     java.lang.String name)
        Initializes a new instance of the GuiTextSlider class.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of this slider.
        xPos - The X-Axis Position of this slider.
        yPos - The Y-Axis Position of this slider.
        width - The width of this slider.
        height - The height of this slider.
        minVal - The minimum value of this slider.
        maxVal - The maximum value of this slider.
        currentVal - The default value of this slider.
        name - The name of this slider.
